content.raw:
I was thinking from the users' perspective when they first see the Noise API. If they don't know about the `SensorFactory` class and see that `Noise` takes a constructor, it prompts them to try out instantiating the noise class by calling its constructor with a type. 

I will update this pull request to enforce the design with virtual functions and add more doxygen comments to make it clear how the classes should be used.
content.html:
I was thinking from the users' perspective when they first see the Noise API. If they don't know about the SensorFactory class and see that Noise takes a constructor, it prompts them to try out instantiating the noise class by calling its constructor with a type.

I will update this pull request to enforce the design with virtual functions and add more doxygen comments to make it clear how the classes should be used.
